column1: If we win we must enact a new Voting Rights Act. If we win we will take climate action. If we win we will pass Covid relief. There’s so much we can do right away if we win. Thank you to everyone who has worked their ass off for this great country. Lots more to do.
His closing message is that Covid is not a big deal and we should only count the votes that benefit him. So if you are undecided I totally understand.
The stock market understandably doesn’t like to hear that the President of the United States is giving up on Covid.
Just got a routine Covid test back negative.

I have never been so ready. Their closing message is extremely pro-Covid and it’s just so maddening to think about the people who will die and the businesses that will shutter because of them. We must smash them at the ballot box. And I think we can raise a ton. Let’s do it. https://t.co/E2miEdf0IX
Their closing message is to deliver the Coronavirus personally to as many people as possible.
They are lying again. There is no CDC guideline that says you can go to large rallies if you’ve been exposed to COVID. None. https://t.co/G3FU9Jlx32

They stood with him after Lafayette Park. They stood with him after Helsinki. They stood with him after “fine people on both sides.” They stood with him after Ukraine. They stood with him after a failed COVID response. But “no more Covid relief!” is where they find their spine.

Next week in response to the Covid crisis Mitch McConnell will confirm a bunch of right wing federal judges. When all you have is a hammer everything looks like a nail.

This is ghoulish and immoral. Dr. Fauci was under anesthesia when the COVID Task Force met and decided to test way fewer Americans. Donald Trump isn’t just mismanaging COVID-19 he is going out of his way during his convention to make it worse. He won’t stop until we stop him.

Slavery was an evil and not a necessary one. Police don’t need tanks. The Republicans have not been legislating on Covid for 2 months. The President never ever changes his tone. In the middle of a pandemic republicans are suing to take away your health care. Nazis are bad.

They have waited more than two months to even start the legislative process on COVID relief. No hearings no votes. Leader Mcconnell specifically said they felt no sense of urgency last month. And then they took an extra week to negotiate with themselves. They are botching this.

The economy is in the toilet because our response to coronavirus is incompetent cruel greedy and anti science. There’s a tendency in a crisis to not want to assign blame but this thing is gonna last a while and if we don’t blame these clowns it could be  another 18 months.

BIG COVID19 NEWS. There is a cheap way non pharmaceutical way to reduce transmission of this virus that doesn't require that anyone even go to the doctor. You just have to put a piece of cloth over your nose and mouth and fasten it.
